Other feed intake monitor of pig performance test station

Source: R/other_monitor.R
other_monitor.Rd

Other feed intake monitor of pig performance test station

other_monitor(data, house_width, save_path)

Arguments

data

A data frame or data table. This is the data to be processed. It should have specific columns depending on the station type.

house_width

A character or numeric value specifying the width of the house number.If numeric, it will be converted to a character string.

save_path

A character string specifying the path where the output PNG files will be saved.

Value

A list of data.tables, each representing different aspects of station monitoring results. This list is also saved to an Excel file at the specified save_path.

Examples

# Load CSV data
data <- data.table::fread("C:/Users/Dell/Documents/projects/pptsdm_data/ppt_monitor_test_data.csv")
# Monitor station and data
res <- other_monitor(data = data, house_width = "1", save_path = "C:/Users/Dell/Downloads/test")
#> • There are no duplicate responders in different locations.
#> 
# Monitor the number of times 'na' appears in the last 7 days
res$responder_na
#>    location 24-04-07 24-04-08 24-04-09 24-04-10 24-04-11 sum_na
#>      <char>    <int>    <int>    <int>    <int>    <int>  <num>
#> 1:      502        2        1        1        3        2      9
